name: Boeka Treats
description:
Boeka treats is a game based on the culture and traditions of the Cape-Malay people of Cape Town, South Africa.

When you start the game you'll be given a chance to explore the community around you. Interact with each of the homes to find out which treat each family likes to receive.

Deliver the treats that the family likes the most but don't worry too much about giving people something else, they won't mind.

You have 60 (in-game) minutes to deliver treats to 6 families.

KEYS: WASD keys - Movement

[Mouse] - Camera Control

[Spacebar] - Interaction

DEVELOPED BY: Zayd Carelse

Please see the in-game credits for any other credit references.
